lending_agreement: I, %{borrowerName}, authorize %{lenderName} to take legal actions or pay extra if not pay on time. %{lenderName} can also send me reminder message about this loan.
attachments_add_camera_permission_state: Permission is required to be able to upload documents. Current permissions is %{permission}
attachments_add_help_text: These documents are private and only visible to people you choose to share with.
attachments_list_user_not_shared: This user has not shared any documents with you yet. Shared documents will appear here
attachments_list_user_has_no_attachments: You currently do not have any documents. Attach images and pdf files to any transaction
auth_forget_password_not_alone: You are not alone. This happens to the best of us
auth_reset_password_help_text: An email with security code was sent to your email. Input it and set a new password
auth_verifyphone_success_message: All clear. OTP confirmed. Waiting for further verification...
account_deletion_desc: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
account_deletion_success: The request to delete your account was sent successfully. You will be notified when completed. This process is done manually and may take up to 24 hours
settings_download_invitation: %{firstName} invited you to download %{appName}. Overly simplified way to track every penny
